Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.welcome: Welcome to our website. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions:

termsList.risk: Use of the site is at your own risk.
termsList.modify: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
termsList.content: All content provided on this site is for informational purposes only.

Terms.details: For more details, please read our full Terms and Conditions document.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information:

points.consent: We collect personal information only with your consent.
points.sharing: Your data will not be shared with third parties without your permission.
points.security: We implement security measures to protect your information.

Privacy.details: For more details, please read our full Privacy Policy document.
